channel.title: Need help with a few things
channel.description:
I need help changing max hit with spec. I changed str bonus but, then my regular attacks hit much higher than my special max hit.
Also, how do you change range max hit because with 99 range I hit like 10's.
If anyone would help me with this I'd greatly appreciate it!

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

For the special damage change the hitDiff = whatever in your attack method under usingSpecial == true

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Yes change that 20 to what you want it too be.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Rrie Rrie
item.description:
@Rrie wrote:

This is where CalculateRange was…

if(UseBow){
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
CheckArrows();
CalculateRange();
hitDiff = misc.random(20);

}

Do I change the 20 in there?
hitDiff = misc.random(20)

ALSO, about changing the specDamage. This is the dark bow. Where do I change the Spec max hit?

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156 && specialAmount >= 50) {
                                    ProjectileSpec(380, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX);
				calculateSpecial();
				darkbow();
				usingSpecial = false;
				specialDamage = 0;
				specialDamage2 = 0;
				}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a few things

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

musicmad441:

I think somewhere their is a command, that will tell you what you max hit is, with dharoks it is something like 67 on runescape private servers. I’ll try and look for a command.

"+playerMaxHit

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

For Range:

CalculateRangeHit();

It’s called something like that.

For max hit with a spec, there should be like

SpecDamage(Damagehere);

Try changing that.

Read full topic
